SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes

Interface TileMapContainer

All Superinterfaces:
DependencyInjector, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.SupplierProvider, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.TileMapListProvider
public interface TileMapContainer extends com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.SupplierProvider, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.TileMapListProvider, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, DependencyInjector
Implementing this interface exposes the addTileMap(TileMap) method. An TileMap that is instantiated, but not registered, will not be added to the YaegerScene.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    addTileMap(TileMap tileMap)
    Register an TileMap.
    default void
    initTileMaps()
    Initialize all instances of TileMap that were added to this TileMapContainer.
    void
    setupTileMaps()
    Only instances of Timer that are registered with the method addTileMap(TileMap) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.core.DependencyInjector

    getInjector

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider

    getHeight, getWidth

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.SupplierProvider

    getEntitySupplier

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.TileMapListProvider

    getTileMaps

  • Method Details

    • setupTileMaps

      void setupTileMaps()
      Only instances of Timer that are registered with the method addTileMap(TileMap) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.

    • initTileMaps

      default void initTileMaps()
      Initialize all instances of TileMap that were added to this TileMapContainer.

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

    • addTileMap

      default void addTileMap(TileMap tileMap)
      Register an TileMap.
      Parameters:
      tileMap - The TileMap that should be registered.
